attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Outsourcing is taking valuable employment opportunities and revenue out of the UK, and negatively effecting the development and functionality of our society.
As citizens of this nation we should be assured to know that companies that wish to trade on our shores, would supply residents with employment within their sector of business.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
